channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI offers free ChatGPT Go for one year to all users in India
item.description: ChatGPT Go is now free for Indian users under a limited-time promotional offer.

item.title: CEO of Alphabet’s X, Astro Teller, on what makes a moonshot
item.description: Teller says X has a 2% hit rate, which means that most of the things the company tries don't work out, and that's okay.

item.title: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan says AI will shorten our workweek
item.description: Zoom CEO Eric Yuan says that, in a few years, we should be working a 3-4 day workweek because of AI.

item.title: PayPal partners with OpenAI to let users pay for their shopping within ChatGPT
item.description: Paypal said on Tuesday that it is adopting a protocol in combination with OpenAI's "Instant Checkout" feature to let users pay for their shopping dire...

item.title: Venture capital is not an asset class, says Sequoia’s Roelof Botha
item.description: Sequoia's managing partner Roelof Botha noted that there are currently 3,000 venture firms in the United States, while there were just 1,000 when he j...

item.title: Amazon reportedly plans to cut around 30,000 corporate jobs
item.description: Amazon could be planning to cut up to 30,000 corporate positions starting on Tuesday.

item.title: The All-Clad Pizza Oven Is $800 Off Right Now
item.description: The All-Clad pizza oven was one of my biggest surprises of the summer. For some reason, it's over 60 percent off today.

item.title: Robotaxi companies must do more to prove safety, Waymo co-CEO says
item.description: Waymo co-CEO Tekedra Mawakana urged rival autonomous vehicle companies to be more transparent about their safety data.

item.title: The Best Deals From the All-Clad Factory Seconds Sale on Kitchen Essentials (2025)
item.description: All-Clad cookware is the best you can buy—and it has a price tag to match. This sale will stretch your dollars, but it ends in a few days.

item.title: Waymo co-CEO on robotaxi vandalism: ‘We’re not standing for it’
item.description: Waymo co-CEO Tekedra Mawakana opened up at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 about the vandalism of its cars and how the company pushes back on government surve...
